You can search any place nearby or with-in the specified city. We will display specific or all related shops to match your search. We provide almost all the numbers of all departments and shops registered with us. You can perform bookings as well. If you have a shop or somethings and want to be a part of our growing industry then add your place by following simple steps. We will handle everything for you. As you have the app in your pocket then you do not have to worry about anything.

1. Reporting Suspicious Activity :
Citizens are encouraged to report any suspicious activity they observe to the police. This can include things like unfamiliar people or vehicles in the neighborhood, unusual noises, or suspicious behavior. 2. Locking Doors and Windows :
Citizens are advised to keep doors and windows locked at all times, even when they are at home. This can help prevent burglaries and home invasions. 3. Using Alarms and Security Systems:
Citizens may be encouraged to install alarms and security systems in their homes to deter burglars and alert the police in the event of a break-in. 4. Parking Safety:
Citizens are advised to park in well-lit areas and to lock their cars when they leave them. Valuables should be kept out of sight to reduce the risk of theft. 5. Obeying Traffic Laws:
Citizens are advised to obey traffic laws and to wear seat belts while driving. They may also be reminded of the dangers of driving under the influence of drugs or alcohol.
1. Arrive early:
Arrive at the bus station early to ensure that you have plenty of time to find your bus and board it. 2. Know your bus number:
Make sure you know the bus number and destination of the bus you want to board. Check the bus schedule and platform information to make sure you get on the right bus. 3. Keep your belongings with you:
Keep your bags and belongings with you at all times. Don't leave them unattended, as this could create a security risk. 4. Be aware of your surroundings:
Be aware of your surroundings and stay alert at all times. If you see anything suspicious or concerning, report it to the bus station staff or the police. 5. Respect other passengers:
Be respectful of other passengers. Keep your noise level down and avoid bothering others.
